divs: sighting detailsat approx. 7:30 p.m. this evening, as i and a friend sat on our back deck in conversation , i looked up and saw this contrail in the slightly north and west sky above my home. i rudely interrupted our conversation and asked her to look at it too, which she did , as i explained what i saw and why it was important. i have read , watched videos and television shows, and it was...donuts on a rope . period - there is no other way to describe it . whatever caused it was unheard and unseen, we had typical high winds today , 25-30 miles an hour, with gusts to 35 mph , but this was at an altitude that, while clearly visible and fairly low, was not quite as subject to these wind speeds . we watched and the winds diminished \ dissipated it over 10-15 minutes, but it was the largest , fattest and most unusual contrail i 've ever seen, and i watch ( and listen to ) planes many nights ( and days ) as i grew up in the flight path of the airport and live just a very few miles south and east of boeing wichita. we get all kinds of planes all the time, and we get nice straight thin jet contrails - this was noticably very different . with the winds, we heard no sound at ground level, this is all i can report . i would just like this noted. thank you - kim . vornauf
Summary: CONTRAIL - DONUTS ON A ROPE - INDISPUTABLE
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Wichita
There were no other sightings in Wichita on or around May 21st 2007
